name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	       Orientation
2	       Unit 1 Internet Personalities
3	       Unit 1 Internet Personalities
4	       Unit 2 Changing Your Diet
5	       Unit 2 Changing Your Diet
6	       Unit 3 Comparing Educational Styles
7	       Unit 3 Comparing Educational Styles
8	       Review 1 /  Midterm exam
9	       Midterm Proficiency Test
10	       Unit 4 Sports Legend
11	       Unit 4 Sports Legend
12	       Unit 5 The New Site
13	       Unit 5 The New Site
14	       Unit 6 Innovative Snacks
15	       Unit 6 Innovative Snacks
16	       Discussion and review
17	       Final exam
18	       Final Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
B.各班正規課程成績 = 出席*10%+平時成績*30%+期中考試*30%+期末考試*30%
C.期中會考測驗成績
D.期末會考測驗成績
E.學期總成績= B*70%+C*15%+ D*15%
